word_mean: 保存剂，防腐剂：于产品中加入的一种物质或制剂，以便杀灭微生物或抑制其繁殖
抑制微生物生长繁殖，防止食品腐败变质的添加剂。

sentence.Network_en: The wood is treated with preservative to prevent decay.
sentence.Network_cn: 这块木头用防腐剂处理过以防止腐烂.

sentence.Network_en: Make sure the panels are treated with a wood preservative.
sentence.Network_cn: 确保镶板用木材防腐剂处理过.

sentence.Network_en: New timber should be treated with a preservative.
sentence.Network_cn: 新采的圆木应进行防腐处理.

PerfectNetExp.abs: TOEIC词汇汇总 ... parched 焦干的；极渴的 14. preservative 防腐剂 16. recipe 食谱；烹饪法；秘诀 17.
寄托蓝宝书英文释义版 ... prescription n 处方；命令，指示 preservative n 预防法，预防药，防腐剂 pretense n 虚假，伪装.
药剂学词汇_中国百科网 ... prescription 处方 preservative 防腐的，防腐剂 prodrug 前体药物.
剑八阅读词汇专题：Test&nbsp;4_echo_新浪博客 ... container n. 容器 preservative n. 保鲜剂；防腐剂 vary v. 变化.

list.abs: 医学词汇（P）--上海翻译公司-021-58377363 ... present-day 现代的，现在的 preservation 保存，保护，收藏，维护 preserver 储藏柜.
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... observatory n 天文台 preserve v 保存，保藏 reserve v 保留；预定.
英语构词法（精品） - 豆丁网 ... preview 预览 preserve 保护 11. protest 抗议表示“向前”.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: via Old French from medieval Latin praeservativus, from late Latin praeservat- 'kept', from the verb praeservare (see preserve)

entry.def: A preservative is a chemical that prevents things from decaying. Some preservatives are added to food, and others are used to treat wood or metal.

example.ex: Nitrates are used as preservatives in food manufacture...
example.tran: 硝酸盐在食品加工业中被用作防腐剂。

example.ex: Though the panels come pre-treated, they needed a final sealing with two coats of preservative.
example.tran: 虽然这些镶板运来时经过了预处理，但是还需要涂上两层防腐剂进行最后的密封。

means.word_mean: 1. a chemical compound that is added to protect against decay or decomposition
1. tending or having the power to preserve;

sentences.sentence: "the timbers should be treated with a preservative"

auth_sentence.content: In consumer products, it works as a preservative.
auth_sentence.res_content: In consumer products, it works as a preservative.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: In consumer products, it works as a preservative.

auth_sentence.content: One can request vaccination without the preservative Thimerosal.
auth_sentence.res_content: One can request vaccination without the preservative Thimerosal.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: One can request vaccination without the preservative Thimerosal.

auth_sentence.content: Vodka, however, is not a very viable preservative.
auth_sentence.res_content: Vodka, however, is not a very viable preservative.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Vodka, however, is not a very viable preservative.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表形容词,"有……倾向(性质)的;……的"; 2. 表名词,"人或物等"

stems_affixes.word_buile: affirm肯定+ative有……倾向(性质)的;……的→adj.赞成的,肯定的
argument争论+ative有……倾向(性质)的;……的→adj.爱争论的,好辩论的
authority权威,威信+ative有……倾向(性质)的;……的→adj.权威性的,命令式的
e出+voc喊+ative有……倾向(性质)的;……的→把感情喊出来
figu形体,用形象比喻+ative有……倾向(性质)的;……的→adj.比喻的,借喻的
lucr钱+ative有……倾向(性质)的;……的→adj.赚钱的,有利可图的
represent代表+ative有……倾向(性质)的;……的→adj.典型的,有代表性的
talk讲话+ative有……倾向(性质)的;……的→adj.罗嗦的
preserve保存+ative有……倾向(性质)的;……的→adj.&n.防腐的,防腐剂
sed坐+ative有……倾向(性质)的;……的→adj.&n.[药物]镇静的,镇静剂
represent描述,表示+ative人或物等→n.代表
